title: Rp prices dropped
body: Hey guys i know this has been in effect for a while but does anyone know exactly why rp prices dropped??{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
the aus dollar is worth 0.79 us dollars according to google
take a guess
Ty for the help golden tomato
The dollar values can be very all over the place, but this time it seemed to stay in the same ball park.
